text: Panapur langa is a Gram panchayat in hajipur, vaishali district, bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==Panchayat office== panchayat bhawan panapur (पंचायत भवन panapur ) Panchayati Raj Department,Government of Bihar page number 7 ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance 12 km) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== other road Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are villages in this panchayatReports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for PANAPUR LANGA Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n | !villages |- | 1||||Panapur Langa |- | |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
